name.en: New Taipei New Bus of Yonghe, New Taipei City

desc.en: New Taipei City New Bus is a free bus route system under the jurisdiction of New Taipei City. The administrative district offices in New Taipei City are the competent authorities, and the New Taipei City Government Transportation Bureau is responsible for dynamic management.
desc.zh-Hant: 新北市新巴士是新北市轄下的免費公車路線系統，多由新北市各行政區公所為主管機關，新北市政府交通局負責動態管理。

updateHistory.reason: New template of New Taipei New Bus of Yonghe
